PluginData.Author: dude
PluginData.Description: Removes the check for obstructions when using the 3rd person view while seated in a ship. This allows you to rotate the camera around freely without it being forced to zoom in or out. Great for tunnel-boring mining ships! You can also offset the position that the camera rotates around to anywhere inside of your ships bounding box! Hold Ctrl+Shift and use the block rotation keys to move the rotation point. Hold Ctrl+Shift and press backspace to reset the cameras rotation point to default.
